A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I just saw the movie today and it was an abomination compare to the first 6 films from George Lucas. The writing\, directing\, no back story to anybody\, to predictable\, scenes from the originals were put into this film and TFA (by JJ Abrams\, Rian Johnson's perspective). 

SPOILERS*****

CONS:
there was no back story to Snoke\, he was considered more powerful than Sidious\, yet he didn't make it past the second scene he was in. 
Leia may have been force sensitive bit it was cheesy seeing her fly through space like she was Mary Poppins. 
Why would like be defiant into killing vader and sidious yet he had no problems striking Kylo? 
It was Luke's final stand and I had hoped we got to see him and his Jedi mastery in action\, but we only got a glance at it for 5 seconds. 
The music didn't grip me like the first 6 films music did.

PROS:
The action scenes were stellar.
Kylo Rens character development is an improvement. 
We got to see force ghost yoda (but no force ghost Anakin or Obi-Wan)
